definition: Gentlemen! (start of a speech)/Ladies and Gentlemen!

sentences.english: My readers know what I’m getting at.
sentences.chinese: 讀者諸君想必知道我用意所在。

sentences.english: The gentlemen all are this, and not only a person.
sentences.chinese: 諸君都是這樣，並不只是我。

sentences.english: HereI will spread and share my traveling experiences one by one with you.
sentences.chinese: 這裏且將我平生的遊歷逐一道來，與諸君共享。

sentences.english: Party of no fruit to, how could not keep the hateful Yeah peony.
sentences.chinese: 諸君亦不果來，豈牡丹留不住爲可恨耶。

sentences.english: The following is the chapters content of the book for your preview.
sentences.chinese: 爲了給諸君先睹爲快，以下是該書的目錄。

sentences.english: What we can do is only list out these different sayings for you to just have a look.
sentences.chinese: 我們只能把這些說法羅列出來，供諸君一覽。

sentences.english: Whoever looks round sees Eternity there.
sentences.chinese: 此諸君所見永恆之景象。

definition: friend from whom you can seek advice
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China

various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
current trends/the present situation/how things are going
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
